metas.description: The full race card for the David Nicholson Mares Hurdle at Cheltenham including the odds and form for each runner.

page.content:
David Nicholson Mares Hurdle Race Card

The Mares race is always a top class one at Cheltenham with the girls getting their chance on the first day of the Festival. The last few years has seen Quevega dominate the race and she will once again be the hot favourite in 2014. The Race Card will have all the entries with their current form and price for the big race which will make for important reading before having a bet.

David Nicholson Mares Hurdle Card
